title: Discover Havelock Island: India’s Tropical Beachfront Paradise
description: Dip your feet into the white sand and turquoise ocean of India’s most beautiful tropical island with three nights of beachfront relaxation staying at Munjoh Ocean Resort, Havelock Island. Includes daily breakfast, exotic dining experiences and one evening cocktail each.
offer_address: Beach No 5 Havelock, Port Blair, Andaman and Nicobar Islands 744211, India

title: Idyllic Havelock Island Luxury near Radhanagar Beach with Daily Dining & Drinks
description:
Lose yourself in the untouched beauty of Havelock Island - part of the dreamy Andaman and Nicobar Islands in the Bay of Bengal - with a stay at De Foret Resort, a gorgeous retreat just minutes away from the famous Radhanagar Beach, regarded as one of Asia's finest. 

A sustainable paradise, De Foret Resort will serenade you with its natural surroundings, raw beauty, and contemporary luxury. Escape the daily grind and cocoon yourself in this lush property dotted with wooden villas and suites, each one promising to pamper you completely. Unwind in your charming villa, treat your taste buds to delicious meals at the resort's famed restaurant, rejuvenate at the lavish spa, or make your way to one of the most breathtaking beaches of India.
offer_address: No.7, Radha Nagar Village Swaraj Dweep, Andaman and Nicobar Islands 744211
